entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:26 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -25.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clyde River Airport 12:55 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -25.8°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -29.6°C
Wind: WNW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:27 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:27 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending in the afternoon then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 in the morning then becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:27 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
